desc:
Start investigating the possible integration of 3rd party API's. For example: Integrate with Discovery to pull the documents of a person's policies, medical aid etc. directly into their Vault. Also check for the possibility of suppliers pushing data our way.

When you store the credentials of a user you can later automatically retrieve their latest policy documents and update the version in VaultWorks.

Possible integration:

- Discovery Ltd.
- Liberty Life
- Sanlam
- PSG
- Insurance companies like Auto & General, Outsurance etc.
name: VW - 3rd Party Integration
